message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident it will be worth more than that to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, but $11,000 is simply too low for me. How about we split the difference and settle on $12,500? This would give you a good deal, and still allow me to make a decent profit. Let's make this happen.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $12,500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so how about we try $12,250?
